description: Detects execution of the perl binary with the "-e" flag and common strings related to potential reverse shell activity
author: @d4ns4n_
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Perl Reverse Shell Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\/perl" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-e\ *") AND (((process.command_line.text:"*fdopen\(*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\:\:Socket\:\:INET*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*Socket*" AND process.command_line.text:"*connect*" AND process.command_line.text:"*open*" AND process.command_line.text:"*exec*"))))
